```{r}


files <- Sys.glob("processed/*")
df <- read.csv(files[1])
df_grp_doy <- group_by(df, doy) 
df_doy <- summarize(df_grp_doy, mean(cica)) 


for (fname in files[2:length(files)]) {
  df <- read.csv(fname)
  site_name <- substr(fname, 11, 16)
  print(site_name)
  
  
  
  df_grp_doy <- group_by(df, doy) 
  df_doy_site <- summarize(df_grp_doy, mean(cica)) 
  
ggplot(df, aes(Tleaf-DEG_2_KELVIN)) +
  geom_line(aes(y=Vcmax, colour="Vcmax")) +
  geom_line(aes(y=Jmax, colour="Jmax")) +
  ylab(expression("Paramater" ~ (mu * mol ~  m^{-2}  ~  s^{-1}))) +
  xlab(expression('Temperature ('*~degree*C*')')) +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(legend.title=element_blank()) +
  scale_colour_brewer(palette = "Set2")
  
  #plot(df_doy)
}
```
